items.sentence: Do you think eating with your family is important?
Let\'s not do anything that might get us arrested.
What\'s your favorite kind of music to wake up to?
It\'ll be difficult to find a replacement for Tom.
I want to know what the cause of the accident was.
I want to stay here in Boston for a few more days.
I told Tom that I thought that it was a good idea.
I told Tom that his French was easy to understand.
I think you know that we have to help Tom do that.
Tom\'s parents usually speak French to each other.
